summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于扩展 Visual Studio 中 SharePoint 项目系统的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types you can use to extend the SharePoint project system in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 有关使用此命名空间中类型的详细信息，请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 项目系统](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-project-system.md)。

span.span: For more information about using the types in this namespace, see [Extending the SharePoint Project System](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-project-system.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然此命名空间中的类型的大部分都是接口，则只有以下接口旨在在你的代码中实现：Although most of the types in this namespace are interfaces, only the following interfaces are intended to be implemented in your code: - ： 实现此接口来扩展已安装在 Visual Studio 中的 SharePoint 项目项的类型。: Implement this interface to extend a type of SharePoint project item that is already installed in Visual Studio. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 项目项扩展](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Project Item Extension](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md). - ： 实现此接口可定义新的 SharePoint 项目项类型。: Implement this interface to define a new type of SharePoint project item. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 定义 SharePoint 项目项类型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type.md)。For more information, see [How to: Define a SharePoint Project Item Type](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type.md). - ： 实现此接口可扩展 SharePoint 项目。: Implement this interface to extend SharePoint projects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 项目扩展](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-extension.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Project Extension](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-extension.md).
